title: San Anto
description: Mikie just wants to be drunk again, but the Prophet's warriors have other plans in this fast-paced novel about a group of hedonistic friends living, loving, and laughing in the face of an escalating, inexorable clash of ancient rivals. This first of three novels in the "Rivals" trilogy will surprise you and leave you wanting more.AmazonBarnes & NobleSmashwords
author: Mike Duron
